Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街でも、ラジルダのように 憎しみに駆られた人が？
Entry.EnglishText: Has this hatred taken over other towns like here in Razilda?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……そういう能力者に襲われたわ。 倒したけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I was attacked by malicious Force users. I defeated them, however.
Entry.Notes: そういう -> Malicious because it doesn't flow well

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしも、船の中でケンカが始まって、 それを止めました。
Entry.EnglishText: I had experienced something similar. A fight started on a ship I boarded. However, I was able to put a stop to it.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういやあ、最近、ペトナジャンカも なんかギスギスしてたなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come to think of it, people have been kinda on edge over in Petnadjanka too.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そして、スールズでも あの騒ぎ……か……
Entry.EnglishText: And there was also that uproar in Sulz... Huh...
